recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 0, Montreal Impact 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Montreal Impact forward Cameron Porter leaves the game injured.
timelineItems.title: INJURY: Cameron Porter leaves the game after injury

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Brandon Conway
timelineItems.text: #NERevs home opener!!! #stand #20years @nerevolution

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Attendance might not be great today but #TheFort is loud on the TV broadcast #NERevs. Well done @MidnightRiders & @NErebellion

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Laurent Ciman (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Maxim Tissot with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Brendon Byrne
timelineItems.text: We are attacking early... but you could say the same last game against NYCFC... we need to get the first goal today. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: #NERevs wingers need to stretch wider. Nguyen has found the middle well #MLS #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Krissy Allard
timelineItems.text: #NerevsGame #NERevs http://t.co/G1Fj4HOjYc

timelineItems.text: I almost didn't recognize Andrew Farrell without David Villa running past him. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Ian Lynch
timelineItems.text: #NERevs looking good in possession, pressing high if this is what Heaps means as dangerous I'll take it

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 17' #NERevs 0 #IMFC 0 Speculative effort from Maxim Tissot as he hits a full volley from distance, but it's not far off as it fizzes over.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner following a corner.
Delay in match Cameron Porter (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: R.I.P Cameron Porter's Knee. The turf monster claims another victim. #NERevs #NEvsMTL #MTLvsNE

timelineItems.name: Andrew Wiebe
timelineItems.text: Poor Cameron Porter. Looks like a bad knee injury. Those replays are awful. Terrible luck. Such a Cinderella story. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Katie O'Leary
timelineItems.text: #NERevs #soccer #homeopener #futball #OneNE
#NErevolution

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: decent job at Gillette getting rid of those #NFL lines, plastic pitch looks a lot better than in Vancouver or Seattle #NEvMTL #NERevs #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: BON MATCH!!! Le match est maintenant en cours. The game is now underway at Gillette Stadium. #IMFC #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: amynoelle87
timelineItems.text: Game time! Let's go #NERevs!

timelineItems.name: Beazus McDeath
timelineItems.text: Home. #bethere32one #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: McInerney has history scoring against the #NERevs

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: Terrible. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 19' #NERevs 0 #IMFC 0 Impact forward Cameron Porter stretchered off after landing very awkwardly while coming down from a header.

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New England Revolution 0, Montreal Impact 0.

timelineItems.name: Sean Sweeney
timelineItems.text: Well.... at least the #NERevs have their first clean sheet of the year. They still haven't scored, though. FT: Revs 0-0 Montreal

timelineItems.name: Brian Little
timelineItems.text: Disappointing. We needed a goal couldn't get one. Could have won but took a tie. Better than losing but we should have won. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: Great character from #IMFC to hang onto the draw in a tough away game at the #NERevs - a good week for Klopas and his team. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.desc: New England Revolution receive the Montreal Impact in the first game of 2015 at Gillette Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs. Montreal Impact | March 21, 2015

timelineItems.name: Soccer Therapy
timelineItems.text: The Porter injury is devastating for any fan to see. Hoping it's not as serious as it looked #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: If you're going to have to have a few turf fields, maybe stay away from them in cold weather. No give as it is, worse then. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Frank Cobbina
timelineItems.text: Been said a million times, and I hope it's said a million more: soccer doesn't belong on turf. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: Mapp gone, now Porter. Impact can't catch a break. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Dan Sparano
timelineItems.text: Last 28 minutes up a man. Gotta get a goal here. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: 14,189 in attendance #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.text: Lets go Revs! #NewEnglandRevolution #HomeOpener

timelineItems.name: Kyle J. Silva
timelineItems.text: Here we go! #NERevs #BeThere32ONE

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: "Spring" in New England ❄❄❄❄ #NEvMTL kicks off now: http://t.co/C4YMfJ3Fx0 http://t.co/TsRbqEr7LJ

timelineItems.name: New England Revolution
timelineItems.text: 🎶When the Revs come marching in 🎶 #nerevs #nerevolution #revolutionsoccer123

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution).
Eric Alexander (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Brian Little
timelineItems.text: And for half a second... it looked like own goal almost happened. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Great defensive play by Ciman. I won’t lie, Im becoming a big fan of his today #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Prairie Rose Clayton
timelineItems.text: Two biggest cheers so far: the red card and the horse guy #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Duncan Fletcher
timelineItems.text: Well done revs fan. Costume kind of dumb, but the sign redeems it and then some. #Neigh #NERevs http://t.co/51EmMaykIf

timelineItems.name: Leanne Elston
timelineItems.text: Will I ever stop tweeting about Nguyen's current hair/lack of headband? Probably not. The world has lost something beautiful. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Víctor Cabrera (Montreal Impact).
Offside, Montreal Impact. Eric Alexander tries a through ball, but Jack McInerney is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: And finally, the first Monteal offside joke of the day! Just not the same without Di Vaio around...JackMac flagged. #NERevs #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: ⚽Ginger Beard⚽
timelineItems.text: The worst part of this game isn't the fact the #NERevs can't score - it's the fact that the damn horse guy is back!!!

timelineItems.comment: Donny Toia (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Fagundez (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: ben snowfley
timelineItems.text: Body checks are legal now #NErevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Víctor Cabrera.
Foul by Jeremy Hall (New England Revolution).
Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Víctor Cabrera.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Scott Caldwell has some sneaky moves. 3rd year player who has the tricks of a 10-year vet. Gotta love how he’s developing #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Víctor Cabrera (Montreal Impact).
Attempt blocked. Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Steve Neumann with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Abner H. Aceves
timelineItems.text: When Chuck is on the field the Revs look sooo much better than when #swagudelo is on by himself. #FreeChuck #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Brian Little
timelineItems.text: THAT'S A PK REF. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Farrell! So close! Revs still can’t find the net #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jeremy Hall (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Austin Sheppe
timelineItems.text: since when did @impactmontreal's defense get this good? #NEvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution).
Attempt missed. Laurent Ciman (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Camille
timelineItems.text: Big questions for Juan Agudelo. 3 matches. No goals. No attacking edge. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Revs Citizen
timelineItems.text: Three straight 0-0 home openers. Thats gotta count for something. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: I want a second yellow for JackMac, just out of spite...hauls down Caldwell for the tactical foul then kicked the ball away. #NERevs #NEvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Laurent Ciman (Montreal Impact).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Dangerous free kick upcoming for #NERevs just to the right of goal, about 25 yards out. Should be the last action of the game ...

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Chris Tierney (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Second Half ends, New England Revolution 0, Montreal Impact 0.
